title: Season of Yellow Leaf
description: Captured by the Comanche in the 1830s, 10-year-old Chosen, is reared by the tribe and becomes strong enough to survive the pain of losing her whole world. A unique witness to a vanishing way of life, Chosen becomes one of the Comanche and suffers with them as the white man destroys their ranks. Previous publisher: Tor.
author: Douglas C. Jones
